entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:17 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 06:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -12.5°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -16.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
